DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety ALN-RSV01 plus standard care RSV infect lung transplant patient
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2b Study ALN-RSV01 Lung Transplant Patients Infected With Respiratory Syncytial Virus ( RSV )
DOC.criteria: Single bilateral lung transplant recipient Confirmed RSV infection Greater 90 day post current lung transplant Rejection free minimum 30 day Known viral , bacterial , fungal respiratory coinfection time RSV diagnosis Bronchiolitis obliterans syndrome ( BOS ) Grade 3 BOS FEV1 stable least 3 month Use alemtuzumab within 9 month prior screen , antithymocyte globulin ( ATG ) within 90 day screen prednisone equivalent maintenance therapy Active treatment acute graft rejection
